name: COVID-19 World Vaccination Progress
data_intro: The data (country vaccinations) contains the following information:

cat_feature_intro.country: - In which country the vaccination programme is more advanced?
cat_feature_intro.date: I would like to specify that I am only making available **Our World in Data** collected data about vaccinations to Kagglers. My contribution is very small, just daily collection, merge and upload of the updated version, as maintained by **Our World in Data** in their GitHub repository.
cat_feature_intro.vaccines: * **Vaccines used in the country** - total number of vaccines used in the country (up to date);
cat_feature_intro.vaccine: - Which country is using what vaccine?
